Verses: 1 egipthukkup Pona Israveludaiya Kumaararin Naamangalaavana: Rooban, Simiyon, Levi, Yoodhaa,
2  Isakkaar, Sebulon, Benyameen,
3 thaan, Napthali, Gaadh, Aaser Enbavaikale.
4 ivargal Yaakkobudane Thangal Thangal Kudumbaththodunkoodap Ponaargal.
5 yoseppo Adharku Munname Egipthil Poyirundhaan. Yaakkobin Karppap Pirappaagiya Yaavarum Ezhuvadhu Per.
6 yoseppum Avanudaiya Sagodharar Yaavarum, Andhath Thalaimuraiyaar Ellaarum Maranamadaindhaargal.
7  Isravel Puththirar Mikudhiyum Palugi, Eraalamaaip Perugip Balaththirundhaargal; Dhesam Avargalaal Niraindhadhu.
8  Yoseppai Ariyaadha Pudhiya Raajan Oruvan Egipthil Thondrinaan.
9  avan Than Janangalai Nokki: Idho, Isravel Puththiraraagiya Janangal Nammilum Eraalamaanavargalum, Balaththavargalumaai Irukkiraargal.

10 avargal Perugaadhabadikkum, Oru Yuththam Undaanaal, Avargalum Nammudaiya Pagaignarode Koodi, Namakku Virodhamaaga Yuththampanni, Dhesaththaivittup Purappattup Pogaadhabadikkum, Naam Avargalaik Kuriththu Oru Ubaayam Pannavendum Endraan.

11 appadiye Avargalaich Sumaisumakkira Velaiyinaal Odukkumbadikku, Avargalmel Visaaranaikkaararai Vaiththaargal; Appozhudhu Avargal Paarvonukkaagap Piththom, Raamases Ennum Pantasaalaip Pattanangalaik Kattinaargal.
12 aanaalum Avargalai Evvalavu Odukkinaargalo Avvalavaai Avargal Palugip Peruginaargal. Aagaiyaal Avargal Isravel Puththiraraikkuriththu Erichchal Adaindhaargal.
13 egipthiyar Isravel Puththiraraik Kodumaiyaai Velaivaanginaargal.

14 saandhum Sengalumaagiya Ivaikalaich Seyyum Velaiyinaalum, Vayalil Seyyum Sagalavidha Velaiyinaalum, Avargalukku Avargal Jeevanaiyum Kasappaakkinaargal; Avargalaikkondu Seyviththa Matra Ellaa Velaigalilum, Avargalaik Kodumaiyaai Nadaththinaargal.
15  Adhuvumandri, Egipthin Raajaa, Sippiraal Poovaal Ennum Perudaiya Ebireya Maruththuvachchigalode Pesi:
16 neengal Ebireya Sthireegalukku Maruththuvam Seyyumbodhu, Avargal Manaiyinmel Utkaarndhirukkaiyil Paarththu, Aanpillaiyaanaal Kondru Podungal, Penpillaiyaanaal Uyirodirukkattum Endraan.
17 maruththuvachchigalo, Dhevanukkup Bayandhadhinaal, Egipthin Raajaa Thangalukku Itta Kattalaipbadi Seyyaamal, Aanpillaigalaiyum Uyirode Kaappaatrinaargal.
18  Adhinaal Egipthin Raajaa Maruththuvachchigalai Azhaippiththu: Neengal Aanpillaigalai Uyirode Kaappaatrugira Kaariyam Enna Endru Kettaan.

19 adharku Maruththuvachchigal Paarvonai Nokki: Ebireya Sthireegal Egipthiya Sthireegalaippol Alla, Avargal Nalla Balamullavargal; Maruththuvachchi Avargalidaththukkup Pogumunname Avargal Pirasaviththaagum Endraargal.
20 idhinimiththam Dhevan Maruththuvachchigalukku Nanmaiseydhaar. Janangal Perugi Migudhiyum Balaththupponaargal.
21 maruththuvachchigal Dhevanukkup Bayandhadhinaal, Avargaludaiya Kudumbangal Thazhaikkumbati Seydhaar.
22 appozhudhu Paarvon, Pirakkum Aanpillaigalaiyellaam Nadhiyile Pottuvidavum, Penpillaigalaiyellaam Uyirode Vaikkavum Than Janangal Ellorukkum Kattalaiyittaan.
